price: 6. Ezali na etuka (mboka) moko te eye topesaki etumbu liboso lia bango bandimaki te, boye bango nde bakondima?
arabic: مَآ ءَامَنَتۡ قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآۖ أَفَهُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: mā āmanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknāhā afahum yu'minūna
